com.mapbox.services.android.ui.geocoder

Class GeocoderAutoCompleteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • android.widget.EditText
          • android.widget.AutoCompleteTextView
            • android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatAutoCompleteTextView
              • com.mapbox.services.android.ui.geocoder.GeocoderAutoCompleteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.support.v4.view.TintableBackgroundView, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, android.widget.Filter.FilterListener

    public class GeocoderAutoCompleteView
extends android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatAutoCompleteTextView
    An editable text view that shows geocoder result suggestions automatically while the user is typing. The list of suggestions is displayed in a drop down menu from which the user can choose an item and you can listen to and act upon which item they chose
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    Android AutoCompleteTextView, Mapbox example

    • Method Detail

      • cancelApiCall

        public void cancelApiCall()
        Can be used to cancel any calls currently in progress. It's a good idea to include in onDestroy() to prevent memory leaks
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • setBaseUrl

        public void setBaseUrl(String baseUrl)
        Set the base url of the API.
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - base url used as end point
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • setAccessToken

        public void setAccessToken(String accessToken)
        You'll need to have a Mapbox access token to use the geocoding API within MAS.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Your Mapbox access token
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Mapbox access token

      • setType

        public void setType(String type)
        Configure the geocoder type, pass in one of the constants found within GeocodingCriteria.
        Parameters:
        type - String containing "place", "poi", "neighborhood", etc.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Geocoding API documentation

      • setTypes

        public void setTypes(String[] types)
        Configure the geocoder type, pass in one or more of the constants found within GeocodingCriteria.
        Parameters:
        types - String array containing "place", "poi", "neighborhood", etc.
        Since:
        2.0.0
        See Also:
        Geocoding API documentation

      • setCountry

        public void setCountry(String country)
        Parameter limits results to a country. Use one of the ISO 3166 alpha 2 country codes.
        Parameters:
        country - String matching country code.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • setCountries

        public void setCountries(String[] countries)
        Parameter limits results to a set of one or more countries. Use one or more of the ISO 3166 alpha 2 country codes, separated by commas inside a String array.
        Parameters:
        countries - String array containing the country codes you want to limit results to.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • setBbox

        public void setBbox(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position northeast,
                    com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position southwest)
        Bounding box within which to limit results.
        Parameters:
        northeast - The top right hand corner of your bounding box when the map is pointed north.
        southwest - The bottom left hand corner of your bounding box when the map is pointed north.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • setBbox

        public void setBbox(double minX,
                    double minY,
                    double maxX,
                    double maxY)
        Bounding box within which to limit results.
        Parameters:
        minX - Bottom of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        minY - Left of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        maxX - Top of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        maxY - Right of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • setProximity

        public void setProximity(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position position)
        Location around which to bias geocoder results.
        Parameters:
        position - Position coordinate.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Geocoding API documentation

      • setLimit

        public void setLimit(int limit)
        Limit the number of results returned. The default is 5.
        Parameters:
        limit - the integer value representing the amount of results desired.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • setLanguage

        @Deprecated
public void setLanguage(String language)
        Deprecated. use setLanguages(String...) instead
        The locale in which results should be returned.

        This property affects the language of returned results; generally speaking, it does not determine which results are found. If the Geocoding API does not recognize the language code, it may fall back to another language or the default language. Components other than the language code, such as the country and script codes, are ignored.

        By default, this property is set to `null`, causing results to be in the default language.

        This option is experimental.

        Parameters:
        language - The locale in which results should be returned.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • setLanguages

        public void setLanguages(String... languages)
        The locale in which results should be returned.

        This property affects the language of returned results; generally speaking, it does not determine which results are found. If the Geocoding API does not recognize the language code, it may fall back to another language or the default language. Components other than the language code, such as the country and script codes, are ignored.

        By default, this property is set to `null`, causing results to be in the default language.

        This option is experimental.

        Parameters:
        languages - The locale in which results should be returned.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • setOnFeatureListener

        public void setOnFeatureListener(GeocoderAutoCompleteView.OnFeatureListener onFeatureListener)
        Sets the listener that will be notified when the user clicks an item in the drop down list.
        Parameters:
        onFeatureListener - the item click listener.
        Since:
        1.0.0
